title: Dua Before Eating
translation: In the name of Allah and with the blessings of Allah.

title: Dua After Eating
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
transliteration: Alhamdulillah alladhi at'amana wa saqana wa ja'alana Muslimin
translation: Praise be to Allah Who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims.

title: Dua Before Sleeping
translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

title: Dua After Waking Up
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
transliteration: Alhamdulillah alladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhi an-nushur
translation: Praise is to Allah Who gives us life after He has caused us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.

title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and turn to Him in repentance.

title: Dua for Entering the Mosque
translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy

title: Dua for Leaving the Mosque
translation: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

title: Dua for Entering the Home
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.

title: Dua for Leaving the Home
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
transliteration: Bismillahilladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwa as-Sami'ul-Alim.
translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can harm on the earth or in the heaven, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

title: Dua for Parents
translation: My Lord, have mercy on them as they brought me up [when I was] small.

title: Dua for the Sick
arabic: أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، وَاشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
transliteration: Adh-hibil ba'sa, rabban-naas, washfi anta ash-shaafi, la shifaa'a illa shifaa'uk, shifaa'an la yughadiru saqama.
translation: Remove the disease, O Lord of the people. Heal, for You are the Healer. There is no healing but Yours, a healing that leaves no disease behind.

title: Dua for Protection from Evil
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
transliteration: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

title: Dua for Protection from the Fire
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ وَعَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi'n-nar wa 'adhabi'l-qabr.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the torment of the grave.

title: Dua for Protection from Shirk
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُشْرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لَا أَعْلَمُ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika an ushrika bika wa ana a'lamu, wa astaghfiruka lima la a'lamu.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowingly associating partners with You, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I do unknowingly.

title: Dua for Protection from the Evil Eye
translation: O Allah, bless us in it.

title: Dua for Protection from the Jinn
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
transliteration: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

title: Dua for Protection from the Dajjal
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ وَمِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi jahannam, wa min 'adhabil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat, wa min fitnatil-masihid-dajjal.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the torment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the trial of the False Messiah.

title: Dua for Protection from the Fitnah of Life and Death
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفِتْنَةِ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-fitnati ma zahara minha wa ma batan.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death.
